crawl4ai_verify.description: Recheck flagged resources using Crawl4AI (handles 403s, JS sites)
crawl4ai_verify.notes: Uses browser automation to verify resources that failed HTTP checks

crawl4ai_discovery.description: Discover new veteran resources from configured URLs using Crawl4AI + parallel haiku
crawl4ai_discovery.notes: Crawls Tier 3-4 sites, extracts with parallel haiku subagents (10-20x faster than CLI)

link_checker.description: Check resource URLs for 404s and soft 404s

freshness.description: Update trust/freshness scores for all resources

etl_refresh.description: Run ETL pipeline for all connectors

embeddings.description: Generate embeddings for resources missing them
